title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
General Considerations

The response must correctly articulate a defensible claim or thesis that responds to the prompt and establishes a line of reasoning

For Task A, the thesis must make a defensible claim that establishes a line of reasoning as to whether independent judiciaries strengthen or weaken democracyusing one or more of the provided course concepts: life terms; accountability; or rule of law.

For Task B, the response supports the claim with one piece of specific and relevant evidence from one course country. The evidence is relevant to one or more of the provided course concepts.

For Task C, the response supports the claim with a second piece of specific relevant evidence from a second course country. The evidence is relevant to one or more of the provided course concepts.
descriptions: The responses accomplish none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question. For a student to earn a point for C they must first earn the B point.
